text: Bachalpsee or Bachsee is a lake with an area of close to the First (which can be reached with a cable car) above Grindelwald in the Bernese Oberland, Switzerland. The lake, located at an elevation of , is split by a natural dam, the smaller part of the lake being lower. The lake is featured in Gmail as part of its mountain theme background (as of 2013). Lake Bachalpse with snow- covered mountains in the background. Bachalpsee and Schreckhorn ==See also== *List of mountain lakes of Switzerland == References == Bachalp Category:Bernese Oberland Category:Lakes of the canton of Bern LBachalpsee
title: Bachalpsee
